name: School Assignment - Puzzle Design 2
description:
This is a continuation from the previous assignment I had in school, where I had to design and create a short puzzle using activation triggers and levers. It also had to feature an opening cutscene, an animated door and a third-person controller.

For the continuation, I also had to add detonation/impact, which I did with a shooting powerup that will allow the 2D character to shoot and destroy certain blocks.

Controls are displayed in the bottom left corner in game.
PS: Heavily inspired by Super Mario Odyssey for visuals, gameplay and sounds.
